PHRASE.LANG: kName
The Karate Kid™ Ultimate Value Pack
Lot Super Intéressant The Karate Kid™
Karate Kid™ Inklusiv-Paket
Pacchetto Speciale The Karate Kid™
Lote Especial The Karate Kid™
The Karate Kid™ Ultimate Value Pack
kDesc

No Karate Kid™ collection is complete unless you have all the greatest items now available for PlayStation®Home. This bundle, made for the true die-hard Karate Kid™ fans, is the only way to own the classic Karate Kid™ Headband, the unforgettable Mr. Miyagi’s Bonsai Tree, the new Karate Kid™ movie poster and the awesome “Courage” hoodie. Also included are the shirts “Vintage Strike”; “Young Blood”; “Bonsai Karate”; “Courage”; “Fighter’s Spirit”; “Power”; “Cobra”; “Dragon”; “High Kick”; “Kung Fu”; “Pagoda”; “Karate Kick”; “Blue Dragon”; “Red Cobra”; “Dynasty Wall”; “Fighting Dragon” and “Kick Yo Butt” for your PlayStation®Home avatar. Get this special offer today. All avatar items include male and female version. [#Legal]

Votre collection Karate Kid™ est incomplète si vous ne possédez pas maintenant toute la gamme des meilleurs articles disponibles sur PlayStation®Home. Ce lot s'adresse aux vrais fans mordus de Karate Kid™, il est le seul moyen d'acquérir à la fois le légendaire bandeau Karate Kid™, l'inoubliable Bonzaï de M. Miyagi, le tout nouveau poster du film Karate Kid™ et le génial sweat-shirt à capuche “Bravoure”. Compris aussi dans ce lot, les T-shirts “Attaque Classique”; “Sang Neuf”; “Bonsaï Karate”; “Bravoure”; “Esprit du Combattant”; “Force”; “Cobra”; “Dragon”; “Coup de Pied Haut”; “Kung Fu”; “Pagode”; “Coup Karaté”; “Dragon Bleu”; “Cobra Rouge”; "Mur Dynastique”; “Combat du Dragon” et “Je t'écrase” pour votre avatar PlayStation®Home. Profitez aujourd'hui de cette offre exceptionnelle. Tous les articles des avatars sont disponibles en version homme et femme. [#Legal]

Keine Karate Kid™-Kollektion ist vollständig ohne all die tollen Artikel, die jetzt für die PlayStation®Home erhältlich sind. Nur mit diesem Paket können die wahren und hartgesottenen Karate Kid™-Fans Folgendes besitzen: das klassische Karate Kid™-Stirnband, den unvergesslichen Mr. Miyagis Bonsai, das neue Karate Kid™-Filmposter und das klasse "Courage”-Kapuzen-Shirt. Außerdem enthalten sind die Shirts “Vintage Strike”; “Young Blood”; “Bonsai Karate”; “Courage”; “Fighter’s Spirit”; “Power”; “Cobra”; “Dragon”; “High Kick”; “Kung Fu”; “Pagoda”; “Karate Kick”; “Blue Dragon”; “Red Cobra”; “Dynasty Wall”; “Fighting Dragon” und “Kick Yo Butt” für Ihre PlayStation®Home. Schnappen Sie sich dieses Sonderangebot noch heute. Alle Artikel gibt es sowohl für Männer als auch für Frauen. [#Legal]

La tua collezione The Karate Kid™ non può essere completa senza tutti i magnifici oggetti ora disponibili per PlayStation®Home. Richiedere questo pacchetto, ideato per veri appassionati di The Karate Kid™, è l'unico modo per avere la bandana dell'originale The Karate Kid™, l'indimenticabile bonsai del maestro Miyagi, il poster del nuovo The Karate Kid™ e la bellissima felpa con cappuccio "Coraggio". Inclusi sono anche le magliette "Colpo Vintage", "Giovane Promessa", "Karate Bonsai", "Coraggio", "Spirito Combattivo", "Potenza", "Cobra", "Drago", "Calcio Alto", "Kung Fu", "Pagoda", "Calcio di Karate", "Drago Blu", "Cobra Rosso", "Muro Dinastico", "Drago all'Attacco" e "Ti Rompo il Sedere" per il tuo avatar PlayStation®Home. Approfitta subito di questa straordinaria offerta. Tutti gli oggetti per avatar includono versioni sia maschili che femminili. [#Legal]

Tu colección de The Karate Kid™ no estará completa sin todos los artículos que ya hay disponibles para PlayStation®Home. Este paquete, diseñado para los auténticos fans de Karate Kid™, es la única forma de conseguir la clásica Cinta para el pelo Karate Kid™, el inolvidable Bonsái del Sr. Miyagi, el nuevo póster de la película Karate Kid™ y la sensacional Sudadera del "Valor". También se incluyen las camisetas "Golpe Vintage"; "Sangre Joven"; "Karate Bonsái"; "Valor"; "El Espíritu del Guerrero"; "Poder"; "Cobra"; "Dragón"; "Patada Alta"; "Kung-fu"; "Pagoda"; "Patada de Karate"; "Dragón Azul"; "Cobra Roja"; "Muralla de la Dinastía"; "Dragón Luchador" y "A Machacar" para tu avatar de PlayStation®Home. Consigue hoy esta oferta especial. Para todos los artículos de avatar hay disponibles versiones para hombre y para mujer. [#Legal]

Also included are the shirts “Vintage Strike”; “Young Blood”; “Bonsai Karate”; “Courage”; “Fighter’s Spirit”; “Power”; “Cobra”; “Dragon”; “High Kick”; “Kung Fu”; “Pagoda”; “Karate Kick”; “Blue Dragon”; “Red Cobra”; “Dynasty Wall”; “Fighting Dragon” and “Kick Yo Butt” for your PlayStation®Home avatar. Get this special offer today. All avatar items include male and female version. [#Legal]
